unnormalised: Hey! Any news on Jadeja's knee? Heard it was bad. Also, what about young Karthik from the Ranji Trophy team? They said it was a hamstring pull during the 20/07/2024 match. Hope he recovers before the 15/08 event! Any update before 17:00 hrs would be great! Fingers crossed for quick recovery for all. Jai Hind!
normalised: Hey! Any news on Jadeja's knee? Heard it was bad. Also, what about young Karthik from the Ranji Trophy team? They said it was a hamstring pull during the twentieth july two thousand and twenty four match. Hope he recovers before the fifteenth august event! Any update before five P M would be great! Fingers crossed for quick recovery for all. Jai Hind!
